questions.text: Your resume highlights your experience automating data analysis processes with Python, reducing analysis time by 74% in your internship at DTU-USIP.  Can you describe a situation where you had to make a product decision based on incomplete or uncertain data, and how you navigated that ambiguity?

You developed a Power BI dashboard visualizing hourly sales for resource risk management in your Pizza Sales Metrics project.  How would you apply this experience to building a product dashboard that provides key performance indicators (KPIs) for a new product launch?

Your work on the Shark Tank India project involved analyzing risk-reward metrics for investment decisions. How would you translate your understanding of risk assessment and financial modeling into defining product strategy and prioritizing features for a new product?

Given your experience with SQL, Python, and Power BI, how would you approach building a data pipeline to collect, process, and analyze user data to inform product development decisions for a new SaaS product?

You mention stakeholder communication as a key skill.  Describe a time you had to persuade a skeptical stakeholder to adopt a new product feature or strategy. What techniques did you use, and what was the outcome?
